name: HATS: Get Happy
description:
In Hats, you have a simple task.  Find and pet all the animals!  There's more than 50 of them!  As you pet more animals, you will get more happiness.  As you get more happiness, you can get more trophies.

But also, wear some hats, use some stuff, and push some things!  Explore the world and have a good time!

Tutorial included.

Currently available for Windows.
